dc:title: On Pilgrimage - July 1955
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An account of moving everything from Maryfarm in Newburgh to Peter Maurin Farm on Staten Island and the birth of Tamar's seventh child, Martha.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 240 1955-07-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
